author: wsmoak
msg: Added dependency scopes.  (This does not affect the Maven 1.0 build, but helps with the conversion to m2 poms.)
Adopt standard group and artifact names for Sun's Servlet API jar.
Move to the Validator 1.2 release candidate.

author: wsmoak
msg: Include validator-rules.xml in the struts-core jar.
Removed dependencies related to TLD generation (TLDs are in src/tld.)

author: ammulder
msg: Goodbye to the old database portlet

author: ammulder
msg: GERONIMO-1160 : Finish the first pass at the database pools portlet
- Better access to dynamic GBean properties (used by connectors)
- Connector MCF can navigate you to ConnectionManager
- ResourceAdapterModule captures some basic info from the J2EE DD
- Now handles XA and non-TranQL JDBC resource adapters
- Now editing an existing pool works

author: ate
msg: Increased the PORTLET_STATISTICS.PORTLET column width to 255 as 80 is way to short.
